attributes.action: Captain Tom Moore deserves a knighthood for raising £15 million for the NHS.
attributes.additional_details: Raising spirits during the lockdown and raising £15 million for the NHS.
attributes.background: Award Captain Tom Moore a knighthood.

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
